CustomField.formula: IF(Combined_Rating__c >= 4.75,IMAGE("/resource/Stars5", "5 Stars"), IF(Combined_Rating__c >= 4.25,IMAGE("/resource/Stars4_5", "4.5 Stars"), IF(Combined_Rating__c >= 3.75,IMAGE("/resource/Stars4", "4 Stars"), IF(Combined_Rating__c >= 3.25,IMAGE("/resource/Stars3_5", "3.5 Stars"), IF(Combined_Rating__c >= 2.75,IMAGE("/resource/Stars3", "3 Stars"), IF(Combined_Rating__c >= 2.25,IMAGE("/resource/Stars2_5", "2.5 Stars"), IF(Combined_Rating__c >= 1.75,IMAGE("/resource/Stars2", "2 Stars"), IF(Combined_Rating__c >= 1.25,IMAGE("/resource/Stars1_5", "1.5 Stars"), IF(Combined_Rating__c >= 0.75,IMAGE("/resource/Stars1", "1 Star"), IF(Combined_Rating__c >= 0.25,IMAGE("/resource/Stars_5", "0.5 Star"), IMAGE("/resource/Stars0", "0 Stars")))))))))))
CustomField.label: Rating
